content: careful not to twist round 4 *sl1 wyib p1 repeat from * to bor rib round *k1 p1 repeat from * to bor repeat rnds 1 4 until piece measures 15 5 in / 39 5 cm from repeat rib round until piece measures 2 5 in / 6 5 cm from cast-on edge ending after round 2 cast-on edge switch to size a needles set up section rib round *k1 p1 repeat from * to end switch to size b needles repeat rib round until ribbing measures 1 75 in / 4 5 cm rnds 1 2 knit to end bind off using a stretchy bind-off round 3 *sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to bor round 4 *sl1 wyib p1 repeat from * to bor gaiters repeat rnds 1 4 two more times with size a needles cast on 48 52 sts using long tail cast-on pm for bor and join to work in the round being careful not to twist section 1 rib round *k1 p1 repeat from * to bor round 1 knit to end repeat rib round until piece measures 2 5 in / 6 5 cm from round 2 m1l knit to 1 st before end m1r k1 cast-on edge round 3 *k1 sl1 wyib repeat from * to bor round 4 *p1 sl1 wyib repeat from * to bor switch to size b needles rnds 5 6 knit to end rnds 1 2 knit to end round 7 same as round 3 round 3 *sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to bor round 8 same as round 4 round 4 *sl1 wyib p1 repeat from * to bor repeat rnds 5 8 once more repeat rnds 1 4 until piece measures 7 in / 18 cm from cast-on edge section 2 switch to size a needles round 1 knit to end rib round *k1 p1 repeat from * to bor round 2 m1l knit to 1 st before end m1r k1 repeat rib round until ribbing measures 1 75 in / 4 5 cm round 3 *sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to bor bind off using a stretchy bind-off round 4 *sl1 wyib p1 repeat from * to bor rnds 5 6 knit to end round 7 same as round 3 round 8 same as round 4 repeat rnds 5 8 once more repeat sections 1 and 2 two more times 60 64 sts now on needles www toltyarnandwool com 3 all text images and illustration © tolt yarn and wool 2018 about rachel rachel kieselburg has dabbled in many creative pursuits before finding her home in the fiber community she learned to knit from her grandmother as a child but got serious about it in her twenties when not knitting or working at tolt yarn and wool she enjoys hiking photography traveling the world and browsing used book/record stores follow her on instagram @modaveloce olallie version 1 1 updated 08012018 www toltyarnandwool com 4 all text images and illustration © tolt
